user_input:
Modify the DHEM model. 
• Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline).
• Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
• Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities.
• Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step. Use the crud pipeline.
• Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the DHEM model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level from the DHEM model using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file...', select the most appropriate attribute from the following list.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999, copying the H2\Gas file.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file by setting all non-zero values to 999...', select the most appropriate file from the following list.

function_args.user_input: Set all values that aren't 0 to 999

tasks.description: Add a scenario named 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' to the DHEM model using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities', select the most appropriate attribute from the following list.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, referencing the new datafile and scenario, using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. Add a max flow property...', select the most appropriate property from the following list.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' including the new scenario and rename the clone to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. Clone the model DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995 and add the new scenario...', select the most appropriate object from the following list.
